events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on May 9th involving their vehicle hitting a pole on Main Street.
Initial review completed and the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the customer’s car.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the investigation and customer communication.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the next steps for processing.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates from the customer to proceed with the claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and detailed photos of the accident damage.
Investigation commenced to verify accident details, assess vehicle damage, and validate liability based on submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming damage to the vehicle and rightful claim status for repair coverage.
Proposed settlement sent to the customer outlining the reimbursement amount for the vehicle repairs.
Customer responded expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciation for the timely support.
Claim officially approved after customer acceptance of the settlement terms and conditions.
Payment issued to the customer’s bank account covering the approved repair costs in full.
The claim has been closed after confirmation of payment and completion of all necessary administrative tasks.
